p: Gene expression is an effective indicator for evaluating the effects of foreign compounds, and the specific toxic effects of foreign compounds can be determined according to the characteristics of target genes. Hsp-l6.l and hsp-l6.2 are heat shock protein genes. Sod-3 is the superoxide dismutase gene. Ctl-2 is the catalase gene. Tub-1 is a gene related to longevity regulation.
